articles.author: Rebecca Bellan, Amanda Silberling
articles.title: ChatGPT told them they were special — their families say it led to tragedy - TechCrunch
articles.description: A wave of lawsuits against OpenAI detail how ChatGPT used manipulative language to isolate users from loved ones and make itself into their sole confidant.
articles.content: Zane Shamblin never told ChatGPT anything to indicate a negative relationship with his family. But in the weeks leading up to his death by suicide in July, the chatbot encouraged the 23-year-old to k… [+8876 chars]

articles.author: Alessio Palumbo
articles.title: The Steam Machine Isn’t Going to Be Subsidized, Valve Confirms – Prepare for High Price - Wccftech
articles.description: Valve has now confirmed unequivocally that the Steam Machine will not be subsidized. As such, its pricing might be far steeper than a console
articles.content: The announcement of the new Steam Machine from earlier this month led many to believe that Valve was making a direct play against the console market, trying to capture some of the loyal users who hav… [+4694 chars]
